verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w becomes|strong="H2930"\w* pregnant \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gives|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w* \w menstruation|strong="H5079"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* boy’s \w foreskin|strong="H6190"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* woman \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w continue|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w purification|strong="H2893"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* bleeding \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w thirty-three|strong="H7970"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. \w She|strong="H5704"\w* \w must|strong="H1818"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* go \w into|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w purification|strong="H2893"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w complete|strong="H4390"\w*.

If, however, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w gives|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* daughter, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H5347"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H3427"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w menstruation|strong="H5079"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H1818"\w* \w continue|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w purification|strong="H2893"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* bleeding \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sixty-six|strong="H8346"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w purification|strong="H2893"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w complete|strong="H4390"\w*, whether \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, she \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w bring|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* year-old \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeon|strong="H3123"\w* \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w turtledove|strong="H8449"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* priest \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H2063"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonially \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w flow|strong="H4726"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H5347"\w* \w giving|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, whether \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w or|strong="H2145"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w female|strong="H5347"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w afford|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*,\f + \fr 12:8 \ft Cited in Luke 2:24\f* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.’”
